name: Brain Age: Concentration Training
description:
With all of the technological distractions of modern life, information
overload and information addiction can make it difficult to stay
focused. Brain Age: Concentration Training uses newly designed exercises
that will test your short term memory access and help to improve your
concentration skills to combat these daily distractions.

New Devilish Training exercises dynamically adjust their difficulty
based on your real-time results, always pushing to improve your ability,
alongside additional new and classic puzzles. Discover the next level of
brain-training – only for Nintendo 3DS.
